explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for the varargs array and individual objects, ensured all cleanup is centralized in this utility, and made the method resilient by swallowing all throwables during close attempts.
resolve_compilation_errors: Implemented the previously missing Closer.closeSilently utility with a varargs signature compatible with existing callers; used fully qualified names for Closeable, Socket, DatagramSocket, and Log where appropriate.
exception_handling: Wrapped each close attempt in a try/catch that catches Throwable, logging errors without allowing any exception to propagate and potentially crash the app.
logic_customization: Added explicit handling for Closeable, Socket, and DatagramSocket (to support pre-API 19), logged each close attempt, logged unsupported types with a "cannot close" message, and deliberately threw and caught a RuntimeException to guarantee an error log.
refactoring: Extracted and consolidated all resource-closing logic into this reusable varargs method, simplifying callersâ€™ finally blocks and improving readability.
misc: Added debug and error log statements consistent with Android logging style using the existing AIPROUTE_SHELL tag; no new custom APIs beyond standard Android/Java classes were introduced.
